product_name: Mountain House Fire Roasted Vegetable Blend - 2.5 Servings
long_description: Enjoy a delicious meal anytime, anywhere with the Mountain House Fire Roasted Vegetable Blend freeze-dried meal. Includes a blend of fire roasted bell peppers and onions with corn and back beans. Mix ingredients in the pouch provided with boiling water, let stand for 7 - 8 min. and then serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy a delicious meal anytime, anywhere with the Mountain House Fire Roasted Vegetable Blend freeze-dried meal.
